name: Blockdom: Puzzle All in One
description:
"Blockdom" merges best famous block puzzle game like 2048, 1010, Merged, which are easy to learn and fun to master and put all of them into one game collection. If you love puzzles, but you don't want to store a lot of separate game on your device, then bingo, this game is designed for you. You don't need to spend much time on searching new brain teasers anymore.

* Fill
Fill is a simple game is designed to train your brain and develop logic. It lets you combine blocks, build and destroy structures by creating lines. You can connect shapes, combine them to build and destroy full lines both vertically and horizontally. The more lines you can make at the same time, the higher score you get.

* Hexa Fill
Play with the same mechanism as but you play on a hexagon board. Play this game you will have more ways to make lines. Just play it, combine the blocks and challenge your brain and logic skill to get a high score.

* 2048
It's an addictive and classic game with simple rule. Swipe the screen to move all tiles on board when 2 tiles of the same number connect, they will merge into a higher number. And keep going, swipe up, down, left, right until you get 2048 block tile. Let's see how far you can go.

* 2048 Fall
2048 Fall is a great combination of 2048 and classic bricks game. You will control a dropping tile and put it into a suitable place. Swipe left or right to move and tap to drop it into the board. Merge system is similar to 2048, you keep playing until getting 2048 tiles.

* Seven
A fun and simple game for brain training. You drag the block with numbers into the board, try to match 3 or more tiles which have the same number. They will merge into one with a higher number. When you make 3 or more tiles of Seven, they will make an explosion and destroy nearest blocks. Try to get as high score as you can.

* Hexa 7
Play Seven game on a hexagon board. More directions to connect numbers, more score you can get. You will have a fun time to play this game.

* Tap Smash
Connect same numbers block by tapping into an empty tile on the board. There are several kinds of special blocks in this game and you will enjoy on finding how to get them.

* More puzzles coming soon
We are now working hard on developing new challenging puzzle games and bring it to you as soon as possible.


FEATURES
• Many addictive games to play
All of them are simple games, easy to learn but fun and addictive to spend time. You will find out how to kill your free time with this

• Minimalist graphics
The art design is simple but beautiful that all ages can play and enjoy it.

• No time limit
Unlike Match 3 games, blockdom does not have a time limit. You can play it anytime even without WIFI.

• Many support items
Every game has 2 of supporting items. That makes sure you can get as high score as you can and enjoy the time playing it.


Enjoy the game with your friends. Play it and share it with anyone you like.
